website_summaries.verdict: While it can be quirky, this mid-priced navigation system is worth considering if you like the idea of GPS and an auto entertainment center in one.
pros: Stands out from others for having GPS and multimedia functions that include popular music apps and radio
cons: Screen occasionally freezes, and sound sometimes cuts out
Software updates are frequent and can slow down the system while downloading

customer_reviews.title: Installed but had some issue with GPS.
customer_reviews.text: Installed but have some issue with GPS. While is navigating , it shut off by itself while the radio keeps running. The app ( google Maps ) close by itself and the unit goes back to the home. Installed a different offline GPS App but didn't try it yet. Will update next few days. UPDATE May 9th. The best app to install is Tom tom GPS. It works perfectly and the radio handle it without issue. In this way no Internet required. So far is a good radio. UPDATE May 11th. Radio works great. Customer service provided a solution for Google Maps. Everything works great. Now I have two GPS app installed and I can select whatever I like.
customer_reviews.author: Maurizio Di Pasquale

customer_reviews.title: Read the description to ensure this is for you.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED REVIEW 9/3/2018.... Working with ATOTO engineers to resolve issues previously listed. So far customer service is very responsive, even on weekends. There are still some minor issues but, I think some of the issues will be solved with a software update which ATOTO is known for producing often.
customer_reviews.author: MarmoMan

customer_reviews.title: incompatible with steering wheel controls
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time looking into this product and speaking with customer support as to rather or not this product would support all of my steering wheel controls in my vehicle, It didn't. After spending a few hundred on trying to get a professional to fix it I've given up. Don't buy this product if you hope your steering wheel controls will work with it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Green

customer_reviews.title: Polarizing Filter for ATOTO A6
customer_reviews.text: I love my ATOTO A6 but when I got new polarized sunglasses I experienced severe red interference banding when glancing at the ATOTO LCD screen. My solution to the problem was installation of a NuShield # NU366RA "DayVue" Polarization Filter for seven-inch displays from NuShield.com. Cost of the filter and shipping was $24.68. The interference banding has not been removed 100% but I would estimate it at 95%; the LCD screen is entirely viewable and usable with my polarized sunglasses. Apparently different sunglass and LCD screen combinations call for a specific angle of ploarization correction. NuShield customer service walked me through a simple test which seemed to indicate I needed a 90-degree NU366RA "DayVue" filter. Installation was simple. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Pico de Gallo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit a few months ago to replace a Kenwood DVD after market unit I had previously installed. Unfortunately there was a rare manufacturer defect which caused the screen to crack. I spoke with customer support and they were extremely helpful in rectifying the issue. I even purchased the dash cam and steering wheel control that goes with this unit, and I am looking to buy the reverse cam as well. I highly recommend this company and their products. I've since upgraded to the ATOTO A6 Premium.
customer_reviews.author: Coutier

customer_reviews.title: Packed with features at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a replacement for the OEM head unit in a 2002 Ford F150 Supercrew. In addition to bluetooth capabilities, given the length of my truck, I was looking for something with a backup camera option. The fact that it also comes with navigation, internet connectivity (wifi), phone casting, and obd2 capabilities is a great bonus. Installation, in my particular vehicle, was a bit of a hassle. It required a bit of dash modification with the dremel and an additional trim kit (the 2-din in the 2002 f150 isn't quite 2-din). I've only been running it for about a week, but, so far, I'm pretty happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Luis83

customer_reviews.title: Real nice upgrade to 2013 Silverado
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a new radio for my truck that could also display my back up camera. I needed: Android AM/FM GPS Backup Camera Display Possible forward camera DVR USB drive access for music Fast bluetooth connection This unit does everything I wanted. I bought an integration interface so my chimes and steering wheel controls would work. Evidently the steering wheel controls are not all available (GM issue) so I also use the Atoto SWC module. Everything is good now. If I use my phone as a mobile hotspot I get internet on the go (maps) Emailed questions were answered promptly. I got everything I wanted. If internal memory is a concern you may want a more capable unit. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. Stop working after one month. It’s not a good idea to buy this stereo.
customer_reviews.author: Sanjog Urwan

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great, But Bluetooth Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a while ago, and immediately installed it. The Bluetooth functionality doesn't work. I tried factory resetting, using multiple devices, and nothing. Every time I pressed 'play', it would freeze, then reset the Bluetooth connection and no sound would come out. I reached out to ATOTO via Amazon AND their website, and never got a reply back. As of now, it's sitting in my house and not in my car.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Frozen image
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this double din stereo and did alot of research prior to buying. It was hard decision because I was debating between a brand name or advance Chinese product. Nice features but customer support sucks. They are in China. Audio quality is not good at all missing equalizer options compared to brand name. Rear view camera not very good quality. But what made me return it was that image kept freezing on me after a month of having it. Tried resetting it but did nothing it had to cool off I guess to reset.did it like 3 times
customer_reviews.author: Gzeus

customer_reviews.title: works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Used it on my 2009 CRV. My main issue is that it was a little small for the standard mounting kit. The installation technician had to do some adjustment to another plate to have it fit properly. He insisted it is not standard 2 din. Apart from that it works very well. sound quality is great. no need for any amplifier. I used a better looking non Atoto reverse camera and the picture is great with not issue. My bluetooth2 connection is intermittent so I have to use my phone hotspot. So for that price it good value
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect android car stereo
customer_reviews.text: I have a problem with the stereo Fitting in my 2008 Toyota tundra also had a different problem i got in touch with customer service they were very helpful immediately shiped me a replacement and issued me a credit for the time and brackets that I had to Buy To try to find one that fits I would highly recommend this company and their stereos they are very efficient very well designed well manufactured and they work great If you're looking for an android stereo I would highly consider you check in out Atoto
customer_reviews.author: G.Ruggiero

customer_reviews.title: Research Over, Phew!!
customer_reviews.text: So I researched for days, to find the right Android system for my car. And at first I bought the 1GB model, but it just didn't seem enough; so the second on I bought I purchased the 2GB/32GB model (A6Y2721PB 2G/32G) and it is flawless!! It is fast enough to run multiple apps at once and the touch screen is very responsive. Since my first purchase I have ordered several of these, one for my daughters cars, my cars and my RV. Oh, and ATOTO has great customer service!! So, overall it is EXCELLENT!!!
customer_reviews.author: DSMeerkat

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the cost but deff could be improved
customer_reviews.text: I've had this since Aug 2019. The software needs to be improved, definitely does not feel like you are using a quad core 1.5GHz cpu on android 6. Screen needs to be re-calibrated but there is no option to do this. Some days it drops wifi connection constantly. Most of the time it works adequately. Sound is great, bluetooth works great. I have mine connected to rearview cam and a front mounted cam. I also connected to the steering wheel controls. Overall I am satisfied but they could really do some improvements.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: GET THIS UNIT. It's the best money you'll spend on a head unit by far!
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal! This is the best bang for your buck unit, hands-down. Exceptional quality and functionality. Awesome support and future update capable. This unit has everything you could possibly want and Atoto continues to innovate! Everything from newer and better compatibility to CarPlay and AndroidAuto capable, this unit feels as good as (if not, better) then expensive $1,000+ units. Wiring was a breeze with the appropriate harness and the double-din fit beautifully in my Crown Victoria. I've added backup cameras, dash camera, car play (soon to upgrade to wireless car play), and LOVE this unit. It's FAST and allows me to switch the car on and get going immediately. No waiting for anything the way it should be!
customer_reviews.author: Bern

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I got the cheapest one because I was scared of changing out my Kenwood. But to my surprise the sound is equal to the Kenwood, not to mention all the perks of an Android. If you're reading this and have the same concerns don't worry it's good.... But you should probably get the better version just for better ram... The cheap one only has 1 gig of ram and it's noticeably laggy sometimes, I'll probably sell this and get the more expensive one later but for now I'm totally happy... UPDATE: I got this in December and it is now May,so five months later it's still going strong.(still think I should upgrade though)
customer_reviews.author: virgil1381

customer_reviews.title: So many features
customer_reviews.text: Love it, finally got a touch screen radio. Other name brand radios cannot even come close to the options. You can do so many things on this radio it's crazy. I've Skyped, used Google maps and ways, used all music streaming services, watched movies, watched YouTube, played games, added Nova launcher, and uploaded a ton of custom pictures and music. How can you beat that? No radio comes close. Although I will say with other brand name radios like pioneer you will get better sound quality and a better equilizer. The bass on the radio is deep and lower from volume 5 to 14 then it almost completely cuts off once you pass that, that's probably the only downfall.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Paul S.

customer_reviews.title: Good System. Lots of glitches. Day by Day.
customer_reviews.text: (update) I wouldn't recommend this system. Too many internal problems. Randomly resets or just blanks out regularly. I would expect these type of problems after a few years not a few months. When it works it's a good system. But i have had it less than a month and had to do a hard reset 2 weeks ago because the screen went blank. Then last night the sound to the left speaker went out. Today blank screen again, tried to reset and still no power. Lucky i installed it myself and i don't have to keep paying someone to uninstall and reinstalling to trouble shoot these problems.
customer_reviews.author: lezlethal

customer_reviews.title: 2005 Dodge Ram, require trimming to fit, but way worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Will need to trim for the double din Atoto A6 1G/16G to fit on a 2002-2005 Dodge Ram. Trim out the middle/ cross section and the top corners. Couple of youtube videos out there search "2002 -2005" Double din install". Here are the parts I ordered for the complete install  , You will need to drill out the plastic welds on the factory dash. Only takes a few mins.  , I already have a crimping tool , if you dont' here is a link  .
customer_reviews.author: DIYdad

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good Gen 3 Highlander
customer_reviews.text: Countless hours trying to get XM on board.... Well, sent this to corporate:Straight Up! Fwd this mail to higher UP'S..US Head Units are Dinosaurs. All made overseas anyway. Newer android units are in, aka crypto! Either one of the top three will buy them out or "XM WILL DIE WITH THEM" . ONE Sat connection and ur done!! Comfy Lazy Chairs dont listen...Make the Software downloaded, and accompanied by our vehicles OEM Receiver Module #, Smart Money already has the connections, and are pissed that XM is not playing along, aka work around, yes 4 free. $6 bucks a month, id say $10.. sink or swim.. Were just moving u along for the ride.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Radio started failing within 60 days of install and no support! STAY AWAY.
customer_reviews.text: Update on my review. After leas than 60 days, the reverse camera started failing. I reached out to atoto for help and was basically told "too bad, you bought through amazon, we wont help you" now other parts of the unit are failing as well. The stereo left channels are failing and it is locking up at least once a week. Atoto still refuses to help. I can no longer recommend or support this company or their products. Check out pioneer, alpine and kenwood. Spend a little extra and avoid the mistake I made. I will be going with a new head unit. With crappy tech support, I'd give zero stars Iif I could. Stay away!
customer_reviews.author: Victor shortt

customer_reviews.title: very slow reaction to any touch screen commands
customer_reviews.text: radio sound and quality is decent. The touch screen absolutely is the worst. the reaction to touch takes forever so you wind up touch it again for a command and it hesitates because it can't figure out what to do. it's like it's confused. after downloading gps maps from network, computer in radio forgets different area but it shows your location but no streets or map. Backup camera no longer goes on in reverse, but it does go on in the aux mode and shuts off when you are in reverse. it seemed like a good buy for the price but didn't even last a year.
customer_reviews.author: Steve H Singer

customer_reviews.title: No Navigation as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This Navigation unit has NO NAVIGATION. I'm pissed. Its the only reason I bought it over the others. Additionally, the volume up and volume down are reversed. Up is on the left, down is on the right. There shouldn't be buttons anyway. This is for a car so there should be a volume KNOB! Great sound quality and good radio reception, but cheap and plain interface. My last android head unit did much more until the navigation deleted and I had to buy this ATOTO that falsely advertised having Navigation built into it. ***3 stars for false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick

customer_reviews.title: great radio!
customer_reviews.text: The ATOTO radio has an excellent value. Pros: -Tether it by Bluetooth to my phone to share internet. -Screen is very bright and clear -Google Map daily for real time traffic rerouting. -Bluetooth to answer calls hands free. -Google Assistant -YouTube music whenever driving my car. -Stream Spotify -Backup camera -Use the charge feature to charge my phone quickly. -Use the SD card slot to record the video from the dash cam. -great UI for AM/FM radio. -Fantastic customer support -regular updates! -Hands-free/Bluetooth phone works excellent. -The Mic works great. Cons: Nothing so far. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Only reason its not a 5 is just the need to splice into my harness for SWC but thats just me nit picking the customer service was awesome and answered any questions i had quickly and with proper information. Have not really dived into the product yet but so far works great loads ridiculously fast and touch screen is nice and responsive. while updating things from the play store it does have a slight delay but a lot of andriod products are like that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very happy
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, -- better than I had hoped. I put this in a 2004 Dodge Ram and it looks / workes better than I hoped. I mainly wanted to upgrade for a back-up camera, blutooth, GPS, and a better radio. This has so many options that you can set it up just the way you want. Installation was time consuming but straight forward. There are lots of videos on line that are very helpful. Atoto has a real web site and and excellent customer service. I got a detailed response to a guestion I asked in less than 24 hours. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: William H.

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: I have installed many Android head units. This is not the worst but it is far from the best. First of all their is no way this is a 45wx4 head unit. Even after installing new Rockford Fosgate speakers the volume has to be increased to abnormaly high levels.Sound is not what i expected from the reveiws either. Function and looks are great.Would have liked the option of a boot screen like the Pumkin unit in my expedition. Im not sure if im going to keep it mostly because the volume and sound kindof bother me.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisSkinner

customer_reviews.title: Feels just like a tablet in your car
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality, for the price you cant beat what you get. the touch screen is very responsive, the 2gig model is fast and has not lagged on me yet, i have watched youtube videos, dowloaded apps and never noticed a bog down. Display is super bright and vibrant, and you can see it in all light and angles. im very very pleased with this unit, it has features of a much more expensive unit, i use pandora, and itunes all the time with no issues. the built in amp sounds much better then my stock unit in my 4runner.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy R.

customer_reviews.title: Google maps not working
customer_reviews.text: This unit is a gamble. The decision to buy this can't be based of reviews. It's either gonna work for you or it won't. I'm having issues with the volume; it's too loud at it's lowest point. Google maps will not work. It tells me to try again later. The mirroring app (easy connect) closes out on me. Bluetooth works fine and sounds good. Again, you're gonna have to take a gamble
customer_reviews.author: Rony

customer_reviews.title: great product!!! best aftermarket I've had
customer_reviews.text: works perfectly love everything about it... everything was functional heart and responsive display everything I wanted in a radio and more. Yes it was definitely worth the money and to answer a lot of your questions that I keep getting yes as long as your car has a double din radio and I mounting kid for one this radio will fit your car. They have a ton of aftermarket accessories for example surround view monitoring stirring will control microphones ext. The UI and touch is responsive customer service is on point fast and very kind. And atoto also updates and upgrades your firmware and system updates frequently. Definitely worth your money and definitely the best radio I've had yet...
customer_reviews.author: jake

customer_reviews.title: Way too many problems
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, but way too many problems. Only thing that seems to do well is the media player and GPS.will not accept regular usb camera, you have to use theirs for another expence. Radio constantly resets while driving. Will not hold preset stations or clock and date time. none of the component video inputs will show video (ie rear camera , front camera, AUx input) DVR records, but whatever codex used will not play on a standard MP4 computer playback, including ones recomended by techs from company. waited too long to return going back and forth with techs from company now left with a near useless brick.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I should have known better !
customer_reviews.text: Had the stereo installed for 1 month . Touch screen started acting funny . Thought it was a ground issue . Nope , touch screen went out has lines all through it . Tried to reset or unplug . Still messed up now everything that I bought for it is useless and I don’t really want another . Backup camera , god , and front Drv camera .
customer_reviews.author: michael moreno

customer_reviews.title: No interfaces made to fit, and customer service is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Customer service is ONLY through Email. Lots of issues. Took it to 2 different installers and they still can’t get it to work with the factory steering wheel controls, and still can’t get the back up camera to work. There are NO INTERFACES THAT WORK WITH THIS piece of garbage. I have had this thing over 6 months now and still doesn’t work as well as my OEM stereo.
customer_reviews.author: Byron K Young

customer_reviews.title: This thing is friggin' AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to put in an '08 Yaris daily driver. I didn't wanna spend much on a fancier head unit being that my job sometimes takes me to bad neighborhoods and the whole purpose of having a beater car is to not attract attention. For the price you really can't beat all the features, and I am just blown away at how much tech you get in this unit for under $200. Install took me about an hour including bezel replacement and wire soldering. Absolutely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: android audio, awsome
customer_reviews.text: Old car... great radio upgrade Dual bluetooth, make sure to check if you can share your phone data with bluetooth, i burried my wifi antenna. So it has a hard time getting the wifi. Always defaults to radio station 102.30 (lucky its a station here) Google maps is annoying, i just like to drive and have map up, like in cars with built in nav.
customer_reviews.author: Montana_AT

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: The unit has very good features but unfortunately it reboots itself very often. No recommended.... Looking for an alternative!
customer_reviews.author: Factorthis

customer_reviews.title: Best Android Head Unit On Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent Head Unit for your vehicle. Sound Quality is superb, fit is excellent, and it looks modern and professional in all vehicles. I recommend buying the wiring harness first before installing so it is clean, and when it is installed it is easy and excellent. I love being able to use the GPS in my vehicle, it makes travel so much easier. Firmware updating is easy, and I am an ATOTO customer for life now!!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: ATOTO Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this feature-rich radio and have added a front and rear camera... I did have difficulty configuring the system, and my installer connected the wrong USB lead... But Sheila LI from ATOTO customer service was very kind and patient to work with me until the issue with the camera was resolved. If I were buying today I would probably opt for the new S8 model that has some upgrades. Thank you ATOTO for your dedication to quality and service!
customer_reviews.author: G. Page

customer_reviews.title: Excellent head unit. Alpine and Pioneer power at a fraction of the cost.
customer_reviews.text: Headline says it alls. This head unit can literally do anything, plus it links up to the Google Play store so you can download and run any app you want. Great built in storage, fast, very smooth UI, responsive and packed full of features. I own 2 of them, absolutely love them. Had 1 issue setting up steering controls, Atoto customer service stepped in and resolved it within 24 hrs. Great product, amazing customer service. I will always be a fan of Atoto.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Dont think....buy it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best radio I ever bought. And I've owned them all: pioneer, kenwood, Sony, etc. Hands down most feature rich radio out there! my phone is now obsolete in my car except for calls and I love it. I'll be buying another one for my jeep soon. Installed in g37 coupe with Metra radio kit. Perfect!!! Update!!: Ok, so if you're having problems with the corners of the touchscreen or navigating any apps here's the perfect solution:. Just when I thought this radio couldn't be any more perfect.....Try it with this mini keyboard connected......Wow
customer_reviews.author: Evo

customer_reviews.title: So far I like it, I will see how it holds up
customer_reviews.text: So far I like it, I will see how it holds up. I installed this in my Nissan Titan 2005 by myself on my lunch break in about an hour with dash cam and backup camera and I have no wiring know-how or any knowledge on trucks. I had to purchase the Metra 95-7406 Double DIN Dash Kit + Amplifier Integration Harness for Select 04-07 Nissan Pathfinder/Titan for it to be mounted properly. I like it for the easy install and I'm a girl. The only tricky part was the backup camera, had to do a do-over once to get it right.
customer_reviews.author: DIYer

customer_reviews.title: Man I loved this thing
customer_reviews.text: This was hands down the best upgrade I ever installed on my car. I installed this on a 2001 Civic, which only had a tape player. It's more complicated to install due to the extra antennas for the wireless and gps as well as running the wiring for the microphone but it's not too bad. The tuner was better than the one I have in my 2015 prius, and it had more features and a MUCH better screen than the one that I have in my new car. I could tether it to my phone and run waze to get traffic reports and more.
customer_reviews.author: DoItYourselfDad

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product
customer_reviews.text: It is very good but I recommend to go for the 2G memory model. I got the 1G memory little bit slow specially when istalling new application through 'Play Store'. or it will be even better if ATOTO makes newer models that have Octa-Core with higher memory as the cost for these specs is now cheaper than before. Last thing I want to say if you have a steering wheel control in your car; you will lose using them and make sure that you have a compatible Steering Wheel control adapter to retain using your SWC.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Bekhit

customer_reviews.title: Very Bright and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant to get this as a gift for my brother, but I pulled the trigger and was very glad. The Android system is very familiar and the screen is BRIGHT! Brightness has been my biggest issue with other brands. Bought this Febraury 2019 (currently Aug '19) and no complaints yet. I'm buying another to replace the Pioneer which I bought for my parents at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Southern_Tech82

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality isn't the best but enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's advertised to do. Pros: FM/AM tuner, bluetooth for 2 phones, optional mic input for external mic, built in digital EQ, wifi module, gps module and 3 usb ports for various device. Cons: Sound quality isn't the best but enjoyable, unit response time to perform task is slow, subwoofer control isn't precise and difficult to modify the volume while the car is in motion. Also the touch screen isn't calibrated for accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sub output sucks!
customer_reviews.text: This works very well but has one large flaw- subwoofer output is not dual - A/V. This means the bass does not reduce when you turn the sound down. Not a huge deal, but definitely convenient If you bought this specifically to run a subwoofer (such as myself) lol
customer_reviews.author: Tom B.

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it would be great but could get mine to work.
customer_reviews.text: On paper this looked great. I bought all the necessary installation equipment and installed. Fit great, looked great, but no power. There is no wriring harness that lined up with the unit and my f150. I took it to several professionals and was given one answer. "We won't touch it, it consumes too much time. it will cost less to buy a more expensive unite because installation is easy and free.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.....
customer_reviews.text: A LOT to cover on this head unit, so I am only going to write some important points: - Cheap for what it does. - Independent bluetooth for OBDII. Which is great. * Its not a fast unit, even with the upgraded RAM. It will start lagging if you use things like google maps. * Predetermined programs cannot be deleted and are junk. Specially the music player and the phone app. * The wifi signal is not the best. Better to use hot spot from the phone. Overall, its a good unit, but its very, very annoying to use at times.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Lots of features- better know what you’re doing
customer_reviews.text: Liked- the features. You can download apps, gives you lots of options. Maps, music, good display, good sound, once it syncs with your phone. And that’s what I Didn’t Like- I have to open my phone settings and turn on my personal hotspot and wait for it to sync with the unit before I can use online music or maps. Doesn’t take terribly long, but the wife (it’s her car) insists it doesn’t work. The gps works without the phone, but you have to download maps (I don’t know how to do that). The radio works without the phone sync.
customer_reviews.author: D. C. Schochler

customer_reviews.title: ATOTO A6 Pro A6Y2721PRB 2DIN. Findly got product that's working! Thank you AMAZON.
customer_reviews.text: Now this second unit sent, seems to be working out very nicely. So far! I haven't hooked up front and rear cameras yet and GPS. But I do have Wifi, Moblie Hot Spot connection now. As before I couldn't connect. With the first ATOTO A6 that was sent (Defective none Working unit sent, Couldn't connect to Moblie Hot Spot or any WIFI ). After making more than a few attempts to get these issues resolved. South America, Caribbeans, USA, Philippines. HOUR'S of talking! Findley!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne O

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: It is a very cheaply built radio the sound quality is poor the screen display is poor I definitely dont recommend this radio. If you want a quality radio this isnt it go with a brand you can trust like kenwood, alpine and pioneer.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher j Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: Best Android Car Stereo in the Market
customer_reviews.text: Entire purchase , customer service all is A+++, excellent product and service. I used in my Ford F350 , from start to finish installation was flawless. For steering wheel control I had to reach out to customer service via email, and they were right on top for Help within few hours . This stereo really boots in half second. GPS antenna, Wifi and dual Bluetooth all works fine. I am really very happy with this product so far.
customer_reviews.author: V-Man

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap head unit
customer_reviews.text: Great head unit that sounds better than the Kenwood I removed. Still haven't gotten to hook up amp yet other than subwoofer, but sounds great as is. I'm still trying to figure out all functions and apps but slowly getting there. The radio app takes getting used to and wish showed album art but is decent otherwise. I have no idea why the SiriusXM's app isn't working so I BT via phone(only app so far that doesn't work). Can't go wrong for price on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great product except...
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying the unit. Installed it myself. However, the bluetooth 2 does not work with Samsung phones. Communicated with atoto support about this issue over a week and they were not able to provide an answer. They tried to make it seem like it was my fault but I even provided them with a pic of the issue shown here. It says in phone settings that the paired device needs to have bluetooth tethering turned on to get internet from my samsung phone. They just stopped responding without a solution. Good product, bad customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Martin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: At first, I was a little reluctant to buy this car stereo because the company doesn't have a website and only a Facebook page. I went to their Facebook page and asked them for information about compatibility with my car (I have a Dodge Grand Caravan 2014). They told me what accessories I needed to buy in order to get the installation going and were extremely helpful. I am very happy with this equipment and I'm going to add the rearview camera and dashboard cam as well. The sound quality, and all the other connections like Bluetooth and WiFi, work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: William E Arias

customer_reviews.title: Returned for a larger unit, but still impressed
customer_reviews.text: Pretty zippy little unit, lots of sound output, and overall it felt really well designed and stable. I wish I could take the software off this unit and put it on the unit I purchased from another vendor (10.1" intel unit) but for the price, the value, and everything else, if I didn't end up buying a gigantic unit for my F-150, this would have been a great unit to have. Thanks Atoto and Amazon for having great return policies. I would wholeheartedly recommend these units to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Justin T

customer_reviews.title: 2012 wk2 works like champ
customer_reviews.text: A bang for the buck. I mean besides the ugly atoto logo en front there's nothing else to ask is amazing it works with hotspot from the phone . Menu ia really easy to understand i have a new vehicle wih navigation system and believe this is way better and faste than the factory one. I totally recommend this look cheap yea but no one will stare at your system to judge right. I installed on my 2012 Jeep Grand Cherokee with some dash adjustment even with the bezel that didn't fit
customer_reviews.author: carlos

customer_reviews.title: sounds good, has every feature you could want for half the price of the "P" brand
customer_reviews.text: it sounds great until the volume is cranked up too much, that just means you should get the amp to sound even better. Very few minor issues and the customer service is excellent, unlike many companies online well worth more than I paid for it!
customer_reviews.author: Craftsman

customer_reviews.title: This radio is very annoying to use
customer_reviews.text: This radio is very annoying to use. Every time i use the voice commands the radio app turns on so for instance if i say "navigate to mod pizza" the radio just turns on. every time I start the car the radio app comes on first thing. The touch screen has dead spots, I struggle to accurately type ( I have normal sized fingers) and some things just seem unclickable. I do think there are better android radios out there.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher

customer_reviews.title: Overall disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I’m consistently having to reconnect to the Bluetooth, almost every time I get in the truck. I have a newer iPhone, plus I got the Apple CarPlay dongle and it’s just always a hassle. I want to like the stereo but it just has lots of little problems. There are not enough usb inputs so you have to use splitters which causes voltage issues. Can’t get the dash cam to work, but the back up camera work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Amazing car stereo
customer_reviews.text: This car stereo is wonderful, but there is a couple of issues about its functionality, especially with volume, it is difficult to control de volume with the buttons or even with the ATOTO Steering wheel control. I think that a potentiometer will be a good solution like always be, but I don't know if can I connect it via USB or with the "Steering Wheel Key(+)(-)" cables? Please give me some advice about it. Another issue is about the so brilliant display, actually, I can rise my hair like in my home's mirror =P. In a sunny day, is so difficult to see what is in the display =( In general, I'm satisfied with this product my expectations were overcome.
customer_reviews.author: LUIS A. GAMA MORENO

customer_reviews.title: Sound Quality is Trash!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is not there. You get a lot of pee amp clipping especially on the subwoofer. But this stereo is not meant for anyone that likes to enjoy their music in their car definitely a step down from my factory Bose on the music quality side. Car is running infinity kappa components front and rear with a matched amp for them distortion starts at volume 10 do not buy the tablet side is great works like a regular tablet
customer_reviews.author: Frank Uribe

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: I had this installed 13 days ago 05/07/2020. The sound quality is flat out amazing, by far the best auto stereo I have ever had. I have not tried out all the apps and probably will not. Every thing I have tried worked like a charm. I added their backup camera and had it installed at the same time. I will be giving it a five star reveiw as soon as I finish this one. Jim
customer_reviews.author: James Lee

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it!
customer_reviews.text: The first one I got was fine. The second one was complete junk. Started resetting itself from day one but then got so hot it melted my dashtop and some wiring. Cost me over $800 to get my car fixed. I have hooked up a hundred or so stereos and I used the correct factory harness adapters, crimp fittings and used black tape over them just to be extra safe. It was passed the return window of course so I am screwed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Q.

customer_reviews.title: Worst alternator whine
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and the touchscreen works perfect. However, I get the worse alternator whine now. For those who are unsure what that is, my speakers make a horrible sound, constantly. I have an amplifier in my car and it is very well grounded. My old stereo did not cause this problem. Now I'm stuck trying to figure out how to get this noise out of my speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Screen died, radio interference bad!
customer_reviews.text: Iffy touch screen, radio picks up interference from almost any near by electrical device. Of course the software is slow as hell and, well, it’s a cheap eBay style unit. My screen died after about 2 weeks. Amazon swapped me another one, I’m sure it will die too. Blah... get what you pay for right?
customer_reviews.author: kelvin knudson

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in a Scion tC 2007. I had to leave out 2 screws, but I was able to use the stock radios' bracket to install the new unit. The downside to this head unit in my car is that there is about a half inch gap on the sides and there is no simple way to keep the steering wheel controls without buying an additional adapter kit. The radio cover also gets in the way, so some people may prefer to remove it. If you have trouble connecting your phone to bluetooth1, delete your phones bluetooth app data cache and then retry. All in all, a great product.
customer_reviews.author: npwsponge

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for what you pay for it. I was expecting 1gb ram to be very slow. Doesnt lag much of course if you open a bunch of apps it will slow down but it is pretty responsive. Touch screen works pretty well and the video quality was good as well. Overall it's worth the price. Havent had any issues so far besides the play services error everything else works great. Would suggest getting the bluetooth obd2 for it only like 10 bucks. You can check any fault codes and has real time data as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: So I received this radio today and installed it into my motorcycle faring it fit perfectly, looks factory. Here are my first impressions The picture quality is amazing. Sound quality is great. Connection to the WiFi was easy. The first startup took about a minute, but after it literally takes 2 seconds. I will update after a few weeks to give a better assessment on how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: William Morales

customer_reviews.title: great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: When I had a question about installing the dash camera, I got imediate help from customer service. After the unit is set up it is easy to operate. I have a rear view and now a dash cam on my ford F250. both are good to have.It was a "big jump" for me going to a unit with no cd or tape deck but it is good to leave that stuff behind.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald G. White

customer_reviews.title: good deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: so far I am very pleased with this head unit, the only quirk so far is it seems to auto dim every time I turn my truck on, and at random times during driving also! Not a big deal now that I know where the brightness button is without looking, just something I cant find on the menu to turn it off... other than that though no complaints for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Derrek

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Upgrading from a Ford factory truck radio. The install was fairly easy but the radio itself did not fit the correct adapter for the vehicle as smoothly as i would have liked it to. There have been issues with the WiFi not reconnecting (25 feet from the router). The biggest issue has been Bluetooth related. When uploading contacts, it has scrambled them twice. Also, when a phone is connected and a call comes in, it takes the ring and voice volume to MAX. This is probably related to the actual phone volume setting. Both issues seem to be known problems. Firmware update maybe? Is it worth what I paid for it....yes. But it’s not perfect.
customer_reviews.author: David Wright

customer_reviews.title: Husband buy
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for his truck. You do have to buy the place piece to install it. And he has a few worrying issues but it was exactly what he ordered and what he wanted. He now uses it every day and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Uneven Audio distribution
customer_reviews.text: I contacted Customer service over my unit completely canceling speaker audio by bringing the location of the audio 1 tick off the center mark. To be more specific, when selecting what part of the car I am in, by have some speakers produce a higher volume, with my unit it's literally all equal or nothing. One tick up will make only the front speakers work, ect. After many emails, videos sent, I was informed: "there is nothing wrong with the unit". I have seen others complain of this, so keep it in mind if your buying this product, audio location DOES NOT work correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and you can play Netflix u tube and many apps
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing it did everything I expected it to do. The best part about it is that I can play DAZN and Netflix. Many other touch screens for cars do not allow that. So worth the money ,also video quality is amazing. I will buy the the 10 inch screen for my out lander. 😍 Also I purchased the quick connect so car play works amazing. So worth the extra 35 bucks you can't beat the price period.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Best head unit for your money
customer_reviews.text: I like the beautiful screen with bright colors and great contrast even in the sun. I wont go over all the features, but they all work great. The worst part was installing in 2005 Ram which had a factory amplifier, which I removed and used the connectors to connect the speaker wires. All in all this is a great unit and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Morin

customer_reviews.title: BEST DOUBLE DIN IN THIS REALM FOR THE PRICE!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the nicest radio I’ve owned for the price. Install was super easy with the labeled harness! Also the amount of things this radio can do is endless! Everything from the built in GPS To the WiFi antenna is high quality. Minus the double sided tape on the antennas. The screen is very responsive and the gesture function works awesome. I honestly never thought I would even use it but it comes in handy so I can keep my eyes on the road! I highly recommend this to anyone who doesn’t want to spend 800-1000 on a name brand radio. Oh did I mention the customer service is EPIC!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan kaplan

customer_reviews.title: By far worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: The best $170 i ever spent, this thing is a work of art. I did have a heck of a time finding a wiring harness for my 2006 saturn vue because of that stupid onstar system, but once i did i was able to install this and it works beautifully. Still figuring it out, will update my review in a couple weeks after i have a chance totweak it the way i like it.
customer_reviews.author: richard dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Ease of installation. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Installed on an 06 Dodge Charger R/T. Installation was a breeze. I’m a professional, whom installs radios for a living, however, I did notice how easy it would be for someone installing at a novice experience level. All accessories you need come handy in the box. Overall quality of the unit is worth the price. Easy to customize to your liking. Definitely will be purchasing this or newer versions of this product for my other vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great unit for the money!
customer_reviews.text: The best money I've ever spent on automotive audio equipment! Screen quality is superb, boot time is even faster than I expected. Using it with a backup camera, OBD2 bluetooth adapter and the Atoto TPMS system. All are working flawlessly. Any system that even does half of what this system does will cost as much as 4 times the cost. Brought my Miata from 2001 specs up to 2018 specs!
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money but not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Android stereo for the money. It requires WiFi which is great for people who have a hotspot on their phone or who can park really close to their house. I downloaded Amazon music, YouTube music, audible. YouTube videos will play while you drive which is cool albeit dangerous. The interface is SLOW though which is one of the two reasons I gave this 4 stars instead of 5 the other being that the touch screen is not responsive and requires a forceful touch compared to what I use with my S8.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great radio for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This worked well in my 2005 dodge Ram ! I used a center piece change out to double Din. EZ and wow so much better. I have not set up the rear cam yet but am excited to do so. It works well. Gets good reception and was easy to understand. Super light and shallow. Fit well. Very satisfied. Was skeptical after buying another type. Follow the programing and it will be all good
customer_reviews.author: Trag

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: 800$ worth of features if not more I always stuck to expensive brand names like Kenwood excelons but this thing does everything as your android phone, definitely worth the money eq is not the best tbh but when your running amps for your speakers like iam..its bad ass love it and btw ppl complaining it don't work I think yall just suck at wireing tbh lol get expensive name brands when this right here will b your new baby
customer_reviews.author: Ray fanning

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Radio doesn't get good reception. Also not set up for adjusting the equalizer easily. Have to go to home screen. Then click on the equalizer app every time. No user set for the equalizer. Only flat then adjust and hopefully it stays were adjusted. Screen is glass and looks great. If you want a radio or functioning unit and not just a shiny good looking screen. Then stay away. Don't know why all the good reviews or all the websites rating this a good radio or unit to get. Unless you know how to install better interface on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kile

customer_reviews.title: Great vendor. Defective product
customer_reviews.text: My unit was defective. I had looked up the reviews for the best Android unit on the market and this was it. I went through a great deal of trouble and expense to have this installed. I can say that the vendor who sold me this gave me my refund in 24hours which was definitely appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: No issues. Worked as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I was able to get everything to work except for SWC, even after purchasing the Axxess ASWC-1. Because its android it will be recognized as a JVC. Their customer service tried to help, but they recommend direct wiring, which doesn't work with digital vehicles. The front camera works flawlessly. The rear camera is fuzzy, however purchasing passive noise filter (capacitor) it was crystal clear. The single sub out RCA lineout is confusing...I just used the rear RCA to plug into the amp and signal worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: PazPaz

customer_reviews.title: Plug and play
customer_reviews.text: I loved how easy it was to install this unit. The only issue I had was my Toyota 2 din OEM bracket didn't match the any of the holes on the unit and I had to drill 4 small holes. Update, Had issue with the unit's wifi not working properly. Returned it to Amazon and got a new one without hassle. Everything is working now. I LOVE Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE Great while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: I had a feeling of buying a cheap stereo was too good to be true. Like they say, you get what you pay for. After a year the stereo died, I have a pink screen and nothing works. Update: Atoto made thing right, the replaced my radio. I hope it was just me and I purchased a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the money once I got a proper mount
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 2008 Impreza. I also ordered the Metra install kit with harness and antenna adapter based on emails from customer service. First off, the Metra kit did not fit the head unit. Even after modification, it would not sit flush. The antenna adapter was not needed and there were no clear instructions to wire in the SWC. I ordered the DKUS dash panel and that works much better. It was more money than the Metra kit, but it looks decent and fits the HU much better.
customer_reviews.author: joseph becker

customer_reviews.title: Well... It's cheap
customer_reviews.text: The stock system sounded good, got better with the deck I had before this, somehow though, this stereo makes my car sound like crap. About to send this back if I can't find a work around. Screen works great, looks great. Works amazing with my hotspot. But this sound issue is driving me nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Hardware except for the screen.
customer_reviews.text: Hugely disappointed. I bought this with the intention of paying high quality tracks through Tidal. However, this unit is severely lacking in terms of Cpu power. Screen is nice but the fact that I can't even listen to my music via the tidal app is a very poor design considering its primary purpose is to play music. Very unhappy with this head unit.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Great stereo
customer_reviews.text: This stereo comes with so many features and is very versatile with the ability to download apps from the play store. Overall the screen is very responsive and easy to view from many angles. The boot up time is super fast it turns on as soon as you turn the key, I haven't experienced any lag so far and it hasn't froze up on me either. It has great built in features and accessories and it's super customizable. I have this in my 2003 Silverado it fits great and looks good it definitely updates the look of the interior and provides features found in modern vehicles for a reasonable price. I'm very satisfied with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: jose moreno

customer_reviews.title: For the price? Unbeatable.
customer_reviews.text: Its much more like a tablet than a radio. With that said, the best vehicles now incorporate tablet like functions instead of traditional radios. This one has great connection with my phone and everyone hooked up great. The angle on my Transit Connect modified dash is fine too. I never have a brightness problem.
customer_reviews.author: Elias Hellstrom

customer_reviews.title: Nice head unit but needs more memory
customer_reviews.text: I have had this head unit for a couple of months now. I love it as it's an android phone in your car. It works great with a backup camera and the remote they offer. I just wished I would have opted out for the higher memory model as it does feel slow and sluggish at times.
customer_reviews.author: UncleSmitty

customer_reviews.title: Alt acc power source
customer_reviews.text: For those that are having a hard time getting the device to power on, you have to find an alt power source for the acc wire(red). I had an issue where the buttons would light up briefly and then nothing. I took the red wire on the radio side and fuse tapped into a acc in my fuse panel inside the car. Now the radio comes on in acc mode in car and turns off when i shut car off and open door🙂
customer_reviews.author: charles patton

customer_reviews.title: Love This
customer_reviews.text: I have installed probably 6 or 7 Android head units in various vehicles. This is my favorite so far. Put this in my dads car and then turned right around and swapped the one I had already installed in my girlfriends with this same unit. It is quick, versatile, and the quick startup is instant. Other Android units take 30 seconds or so to startup which doesn't sound like a lot but it really is a long time. This one starts instantly which is a game changer! Love It!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Scheib

customer_reviews.title: Best head unit I ever had period!
customer_reviews.text: Was gonna get the new pioneer in dash gps for 1200 but Im glad I gave this android head unit a try. It really deserved me to get online and write this. You can always send it back if you dont like it I mean amazon dont take even 2 days to get it to you. I suggest buying it and perhaps the steering wheel remote and the bluetooth osb for the torque app it comes with. I am gonna get a few friends one but I want them to be jealous for a bit.. :)
customer_reviews.author: Evan757

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: Overall love this thing. However... I wish I could get the speed to display on the dash cam video People on the phone complain they can hear themselves echo Slightly slow response time w the lowest memory package. I'd upgrade memory if i bought again I wish the band across the bottom was bigger; it's kinda hard to hit the icons But still so worth it
customer_reviews.author: BSUFanatic

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but needs an update
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, easy installation with the Toyota harness. Fit in my FRS perfect. Had to slightly modify the OEM brackets to fit, but works great! Issues so far: - occasionally the buttons will all stop working for a bit and there is no sound. 2m later it works again - the subwoofer output volume adjustment doesn't vary with the volume, it's just keeping the sub at a constant volume wherever you set it. Not a huge deal if you can control it from the amp. - home screen likes to re-draw every now and then - stock launcher needs more customization options. - equalizer needs more options, crossover options, and subwoofer features
customer_reviews.author: Matt Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Great headunit - Greater Service
customer_reviews.text: My first venture into Android headunits. The Atoto A6 Pro with gestures is terrific. The product itself is great, but I'll say the customer service is even better. Had some questions due to my lack of tech skills and was met with outstanding service via email. Installed in 2014 Hyundai Elantra.
customer_reviews.author: jason101010

product_meta.title: ATOTO A6 Double Din Android Car Navigation Stereo with Dual Bluetooth - Standard A6Y2710SB 1G/16G Car Entertainment Multimedia Radio,WiFi/BT Tethering Internet,Support 256G SD &More
feature_bullets: Developed from widely used and stable Android Marshmallow OS,deeply customized/optimized to let it perform better in vehicles. Lots of vehicle-based features - FM/AM Radio,AUX/Backup camera input, Bluetooth,Steering wheel key control(no DVD/CD Player).

Factory Steering Wheel key Control (shorted for SWC,based on resistive signal input only) can still be retained. WiFi receiption and builtin microphone have been significantly improved. Drivers do not have to yell to talk with the other one

Dual Bluetooth not only work as BT call /A2DP playback, but also connect to phone's BT tethering internet, and connect to BT gamepad/mouse/OBD. Google Maps is pre-installed,and users can download offline map data for navigation without internet.

Unlimited Micro USB Drive/ Micro SD storage supported (256GB micro SD and 1TB SSD drive have been confirmed OK). In additin, ATOTO A6 has Quick Booting feature - Start the car and access system within 2 seconds
Continuous firmware update for ATOTO A6 is available (latest firmware version ATOTO AICE OS 9.6). Get continued firmware update when available to ensure less bugs and new features added.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars2,440 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Wireless communication technologies: AM/FM, RDS, Bluetooth, WiFi, Airplay, EasyConnect
